content:
As we discussed yesterday in our sync meeting, I've gone ahead and created a milestone for Preview 2: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/jco/milestone/1. This contains individual items for every API we need to implement.

Preview 2 Milestone · bytecodealliance/jco
JavaScript tooling for working with WebAssembly Components - Preview 2 Milestone · bytecodealliance/jco
It'd be great if we could use this to track our progress. Given we now have 4, and perhaps soon 5 different people working on this, I hope this can help us coordinate who is working on what.

I've also gone ahead and added some new labels

  • wasi-preview2 to tag all preview2 related work (supposedly we may want to add a preview3 flag in the future)
  • target-web for any web-related issues
  • target-nodejs for any nodejs-related issues

It's not super fancy, but I hope it's enough to help us coordinate.
I don't think we need to scale the API process, once we've completed this work in the next 6 weeks it should be pretty much done
(ahh meant this under the "contributing guide" topic)
Thanks @Yoshua Wuyts for getting these lists together, definitely helps to have the exact progress, and makes it much easier to share our progress
